attributes.action: stop dictating the british people on what is in there "best interests"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The prime minister and many other political leaders are simply passing laws on what they decide (in there small majority compared to the millions of people who live in the UK) what's best for us. when we dont need to be told what's best for us, things such as drugs, Euthanasia and Prostitution are personal choices NOT political and should there for not be under MP's jurisdiction they are civil rights!!!

rejection.details: You may wish to be more specific in your title by focussing on one particular topic that relates to government policy. At the moment your petition is too general.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
